Diego Palmerín, Daniel León 
y Emiliano Herendia
heroTitle: La Brújula.<1></1>The Mexican audiovisual and cinematographic industry network.
heroParagraph: La Brújula was founded in 2010 in the city of Guadalajara. Both it and it's predecesor "El Medio " were inspired by directories specialized in the television and film industry of Los Ángeles, New York, Toronto, and Montreal among others.<1></1><2></2>Our team encompasses strategy, data science, software engineering, data capture, graphic and editorial design, translation, web design, public relations, advertising, logistics, distribution, social media management, and user support.<4></4><5></5>We believe in community building and the creation of a stronger industry through a strong network, events that bring the community together, and promoting projects of cultural significance that create jobs and business opportunities for all involved parties.
